headers.value: default-src 'self' *.storyblok.com *.stripe.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' *.storyblok.com *.stripe.com; img-src 'self' *.storyblok.com *.stripe.com data:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' *.storyblok.com *.stripe.com; frame-src 'self' app.storyblok.com *.stripe.com; object-src 'none' *.stripe.com;
